comment.text: This translation key is used to display a button label that prompts users to download desktop editors for Windows. The text will appear on a button in an application, likely as part of a download link or "Get Desktop Editors" action.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'endirin' is a valid Azerbaijani verb meaning 'download', but the correct verb form depending on the context should be 'qurun'.

The term 'applications de bureau' is a more literal translation of 'Desktop Editors'. It doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Editors', which implies software tools for creating or modifying content. A better translation might be 'éditeurs de bureau' or 'logiciels de création de bureau'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Télécharger les éditeurs de bureau {{organizationName}} pour Windows

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'Windows සඳහා බාගත කරන්න' directly translates to 'Download for Windows'. A more natural translation would be something like 'Windows සඳහා' (for Windows) but it is more common to use an alternative construction. While understandable, it is not the most idiomatic way to phrase it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'Windows සඳහා ලබා ගන්න' (Windows saha laba gana) or 'Windows සඳහා පාවිච කරන්න' (Windows saha paviyacha karanna).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'namizne' (desktop) is technically correct, but it might be more natural to use 'za pisalno mizo' which more closely means 'for desktop' or 'for use at a desk'. While 'namizne' is understandable, it can sound slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Prenesi {{organizationName}} urejevalnike za pisalno mizo za Windows'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Уређиваче' is more accurately 'Редакторе' for 'Editors' in this context. 'Уређиваче' implies editing in a broader sense, whereas 'Редакторе' refers specifically to software editors.
